review: My mom was operated or knee replacement surgery. Hospital is very neat and clean and they were very efficient in arranging the room and surgery date. I would like to thank and Appreciate Dr Madan Thiruvengada for making my Mom fell comfortable and then doing a fine surgery which helped her to stand on her legs same day.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,
review:
I heard about Doctor in The hindu newspaper just wanted to meet and have second opinion  about my knee problem.
Iam impressed with his solution towards the problem,I have heard his friendliness towards the patient and it came true when I met him in person

On my experience, madhan sir is a best doctor. He is too kind towards his patients. I have undergone arthroscopy and I'm just 18 years old. He doesn't just scare patients or exaggerate things. His way of handling and his responses are too good. I'm completely alright now. My sincere thanks to him. 

By Anu Suresh
*** ** *** *****Very very amicable in nature and doesn't scare the patients.He prescribes medicines only if needed and answers all questions patiently .
